name: SYNCHROTRON
description:
SYNCHROTRON is an innovative multimedia exploration of rhythm, sound and science by the award winning digital artist Luís Fraga.

Discover the music from the band Speedtouch as a novel in-app experience that seamlessly combines rhythm-action game mechanics, generative soundscapes and intriguing visuals.

Progress through a barrage of binary rhythm patterns, traverse a crawl of inscrutable scientific quotes and learn about the intricacies of beam polarization in a synchrotron particle accelerator.

Select from two experience modes:

1) SYNCHROTRON MODE: Play as a terrestrial muon in a rhythm game featuring riffs from the titular music single;

2) FREE SYNTH MODE: Jam freely as a cosmic ray muon capable of experiencing relativistic time dilation.

Play time: between 5 – 15 minutes

Based on the track "Synchrotron"
